items.sentence: I certainly had no idea Tom would be coming over tonight.
Tom found an interesting piece of driftwood on the beach.
Tom was scolded by his boss for showing up late for work.
Tom was sitting on the bench over there not too long ago.
Tom was smart enough not to do what Mary asked him to do.
I want to apologize to all of you for what just happened.
I wonder whether or not Tom will ever be able to do that.
Tom says that he hasn\'t yet had time to read the report.
Everybody was disguised, so I couldn\'t tell who was who.
Here\'s a list of people I want to invite to our wedding.
